document.full_text: miami heat star lebron james was the only unanimous selection on the 2010-11 all-nba first team, as announced by the league thursday.
document.title: heat's james, bulls' rose highlight all-nba first team
lines_and_colors: miami heat star lebron james was the only unanimous selection on the 2010-11 all-nba first team, as announced by the league thursday.
